subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Joel Ward, who had only six goals all season, backhanded the game-winner off a rebound in overtime as the Capitals, seeded No. 7, stunned the No. 2-seeded Bruins.
snippet: Joel Ward, who had only six goals all season, backhanded the game-winner off a rebound in overtime as the Capitals, seeded No. 7, stunned the No. 2-seeded Bruins.
